{{include reference="Documentation.Code.CreateMacros" /}} {{velocity}} = $services.localization.render('section.create.sheet.title') = ## ## Calling the dedicated skin extension in order to handle the special behavior of the form elements (parent & siblings selection) #set ($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('Documentation.Code.CreateSheet')) ## Custom styles used for hiding elements on the creation page #set ($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('Documentation.Code.CreateSheet')) ## ## Hide docextra #set($displayDocExtra = false) ## ## Getting the values of the expected request parameters #set ($parentspace = "$!request.getParameter('spaceReference')") #set ($template = 'Documentation.Code.SectionTemplate') #set ($title = "$!request.title") #set ($name = "$!request.name") #set ($numbering = "$!request.numbering") ## ## In case the form was submitted with the expected non-null values, compute the URL and redirect to it #if($request.create == '1' && "$!name" != '' && "$!parentspace" != '') ## ## WebHome name #set ($webhome = $services.model.getEntityReference('DOCUMENT', 'default').name) ## ## In case the parent space contains WebHome, we exclude it. ## Then, we concatenate the parent with the new name, in order to build the new non-terminal document reference. #set ($newparentspace = $parentspace) #if($newparentspace.matches("(.*)\.${webhome}")) #set ($newparentspace = $services.model.serialize($services.model.resolveDocument($newparentspace).lastSpaceReference, 'local')) #end ## ## Starting to compute the new document reference #set ($newparentspace = $newparentspace + '.' + $name) #set($newDocumentReference = $services.model.createDocumentReference($webhome, $services.model.resolveSpace($newparentspace))) ## ## Redirect to the new location, in edit mode, with some parameters used for prefilling some fields $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($newDocumentReference, 'edit', "template=${request.template}&title=${escapetool.url($title)}&parent=${escapetool.url($parentspace)}&numbering=${escapetool.url($!numbering)}")) #end ## #set($exception = $createException) ## ## Check if the exception is about the non-allowed spaces for template #if("$!exception" != '' && $exception.code == 11016)
#set($allowedSpaces = $createAllowedSpaces) #if ($allowedSpaces.size() == 1) $services.localization.render('core.create.template.allowedspace.inline', [$templateProvider, $allowedSpaces.get(0)]) #else $services.localization.render('core.create.template.allowedspaces.inline', [$templateProvider, $allowedSpaces.toString()]) #end
#end ## ## Check if the exception is about the document which already exists #if("$!exception" != '' && $exception.code == 11002)
## Use the 'existingDocumentReference' context binding set by the create action for this case. $services.localization.render('core.create.page.error.docalreadyexists', ["${existingDocumentReference}", $xwiki.getURL($existingDocumentReference, 'view', ''), $xwiki.getURL($existingDocumentReference, 'edit', '') ] )
#end #set ($discard = $xwiki.jsfx.use('js/xwiki/create.js', {'forceSkinAction': true})) #set ($parentReference = $doc.documentReference.parent) ## --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ## Display the form. ## --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- {{html wiki="true"}}
## ## Deprecated: Pass along any received page parent. ## ## The "templateprovider" field is needed by the CreateAction, even empty. ## By the past, it was "xwiki/create.js" which created this field, but it was causing problems when the user sent the ## form before the JavaScript code was executed. ## ## Display the location picker.
#locationPickerCustom({ 'id': 'target', 'title': { 'label': 'core.create.title', 'hint': 'core.create.title.hint', 'name': 'title', 'value': $title, 'placeholder': 'core.create.name.placeholder' }, 'preview': { 'label': 'core.create.locationPreview.label', 'hint': 'core.create.locationPreview.hint' }, 'parent': { 'label': 'core.create.spaceReference.label', 'hint': 'core.create.spaceReference.hint', 'name': 'spaceReference', 'reference': $parentReference, 'placeholder': 'core.create.spaceReference.placeholder' }, 'name': { 'label': 'core.create.name.label', 'hint': 'core.create.name.hint', 'name': 'name', 'value': $name, 'placeholder': 'core.create.name.placeholder' } }) ## ## User Documentation : adding the option to select then previous sibling #if($template == 'Documentation.Code.SectionTemplate') #set($sectionChildren = $xwiki.searchDocuments(', XWikiSpace s, BaseObject o, LongProperty p where doc.translation = 0 and doc.space = s.reference and s.parent = ? and o.name = doc.fullName and o.className = ? and p.id.id = o.id and p.name = ? and doc.fullName <> ? order by p.value asc', 0, 0, [$services.model.serialize($doc.documentReference.lastSpaceReference, 'local'), 'Documentation.Code.SectionClass', 'numbering', 'Documentation.Code.SectionTemplate']))
$services.localization.render('section.create.previoussibling.hint')
#end
$services.localization.render('cancel')
{{/html}} {{/velocity}}
